title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-5.3 - Contents of complete application for a permit modification for institutional control

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-5.3 - Contents of complete application for a permit modification for institutional control

State Regulations
A complete application for a permit modification for
institutional control must include the following: (a) The final revision of the institutional
control plan required by section
383-9.8
(d) of this

Part. (b) A financial statement
documenting the amount of funds available for executing the institutional
control plan. (c) Technical
analyses demonstrating that the proposed institutional control plan will
provide reasonable assurance that the disposal facility will meet the
performance objectives. These analyses must comply with the requirements of
section
383-3.4
(h)(2)
of
this Part. (d) A revised site
safety and emergency response plan for the institutional control plan that
meets the requirements of section
383-12.2
of this Part. (e) Documentation demonstrating that the
permittee has complied with sections
383-9.4
(i) through
(k) and
383-13.2
(e) of
this Part. (f) An assessment of
current local land use and how it differs from that during the permitting of
the land disposal facility and the effect of those differences on the land
disposal facility's ability to meet the performance objectives. (g) An assessment of current and future doses
to the general public due to releases of radioactivity from the land disposal
facility based on the actual inventory of waste in the land disposal facility, the results of the monitoring performed pursuant to Subpart 383-10 of this

Part, and any remediation or maintenance that has been undertaken. (h) A plot plan showing the location of all
disposal units, markers, and any remaining associated facilities, referenced to
the site grid system required by section
383-11.2
(c) of
this Part. Notes
